snippet: Argentina was in sight of a first Davis Cup final since 2011 after taking a 2-0 lead over titleholder Britain thanks to singles wins by Juan Martin del Potro and Guido Pella in the semifinal on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Argentina was in sight of a first Davis Cup final since 2011 after taking a 2-0 lead over titleholder Britain thanks to singles wins by Juan Martin del Potro and Guido Pella in the semifinal on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Del Potro Outlasts Murray, Gives Argentina Lead in Davis Cup
headline.main: Del Potro Outlasts Murray, Gives Argentina Lead in Davis Cup
